resources.string: To connect a camera follow these instructions: 1. Choose Wi-Fi that corresponds to your camera and connect to it. 2. Turn on Location.
To connect a led controller follow these instructions: 1. Turn on Bluetooth and choose your device. 2. Turn on Location.
To connect a fitness band follow these instructions: 1. Turn on Bluetooth and choose your device. 2. Press OK on the band. 3. Turn on Location.
